mulan.classifier.meta.multisearch

Class MultiLabelMultiSearch

  • java.lang.Object
    • mulan.classifier.MultiLabelLearnerBase
      • mulan.classifier.meta.multisearch.MultiLabelMultiSearch
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, mulan.classifier.MultiLabelLearner, weka.core.TechnicalInformationHandler

    public class MultiLabelMultiSearch
extends mulan.classifier.MultiLabelLearnerBase
    The class performs Grid Search for the best set of attributes for given MultiLabelLearner
    Version:
    25.04.2016
    Author:
    Pawel Trajdos
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
